long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Challenge yourself to try something new each week, and keep track of your ongoing to-do list right there in your tab! Includes a new challenge each week, experience points (because gamification), and probably more to come. 

Name and some weekly challenges inspired by "Do By Friday", a weekly challenge podcast: http://dobyfriday.com/
